- Added KODI 19+20 (Python 3) compatibility code basis (Dual-addon: Python 2 still supported) - - Python 2/3 versions still need separate addon version due to required addon.xml changes - - Using unified code basis still makes things much easier
[B]0.3.8[/B] (2022-03-19) (axbmcuser)
- Internal improvements
[B]0.3.7[/B] (2020-03-02) (axbmcuser)
- Internal improvements

- Remove addon from showing as an entry in "video addons" listing
[B]0.3.5[/B] (2020-02-06) (axbmcuser)
- Added optional python 3 compatibility (incomplete, still broken on "python 3 only" Kodi)
[B]0.3.4[/B] (axbmcuser)
- Lite version of original script version 0.3.2 with better performance for minimalistic usage
[B]0.1.6[/B] - Enable context menu/info
[B]0.1.5[/B] - Fix circular reference warnings on shutdown.
[B]0.1.4[/B] - Added missing 'director" property for recommended episodes.
[B]0.1.3[/B] - Fixed bug in recommended episodes.
[B]0.1.2[/B] - Added Music Videos. - Added IMDB Number as property (imdbnumer)

[B]0.1.0[/B] - Fix refreshing bug where things were being cached forever without updating - thx SumnerH - Added option to hide specials from episode views - thx Razzeee - Added duration fallback for cases where the streamInfo can't be read - thx Razzeee - Fix for wrong loop handling - thx Razzeee - Cleanup, added some missing checks - thx phil65 - Additional check for lib stats - thx phil65
[B]0.0.9[/B] - Fix error when no tvshow library present. - Fix playlist statistics when playlist are used that have been added by favourites.
[B]0.0.8[/B] - Add favorite episodes - thx SumnerH.
[B]0.0.7[/B] - Add support to return multiple types in single list
[B]0.0.6[/B] - Add support for video playlist count.
[B]0.0.5[/B] - Add recent videos option. - Add writer and cast to video list items. - Add limit parameter to plugin element.
